title: Netanyahu Holds Slight Lead in Israeli Election, Exit Polls Show
description: If the right-wing bloc does eke out a narrow victory, it will allow Mr. Netanyahu, Israel’s longest-serving prime minister, to return to office even as he stands trial on corruption charges.
dc:creator: Patrick Kingsley and Isabel Kershner
media:credit: Amit Elkayam for The New York Times
media:description: Supporters of former Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu celebrating at Likud’s headquarters in Jerusalem on Tuesday.
